## SynQLite.runMany() method

Run multiple operations against the DB

**Signature:**

```typescript
runMany(params: {
        sql: string;
        values: any[];
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | { sql: string; values: any\[\]; } | The SQL query and optionally an array of arrays or key/value pairs |

**Returns:**

any

Undefined or an error, if one occurred

## Remarks

This method does not return any records.
